content:
ServiceReplicaStatusFilter ServiceReplicaStatusFilter Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Enumerates the filter used for matching the replica status for replicas that should be returned by query.

Edit

In this Article

[Flags]
public enum ServiceReplicaStatusFilter<Flags>
Public Enum ServiceReplicaStatusFilter
Attributes
FlagsAttribute

Fields

All All

Returns all replicas.
Default Default

Returns all replicas other than dropped replicas.
Down Down

Returns all down replicas.
Dropped Dropped

Returns all Dropped replicas.
InBuild InBuild

Returns all InBuild replicas.
Ready Ready

Returns only ready replicas.
Standby Standby

Returns all StandBy replicas.
